overview: Memories can be sweet and oh so sentimental; or they can rekindle the flame of a lost lust-filled love. They recall a time of youth and energy, when passion was new. Join Playgirl on a sensual and erotic trip down memory lane for tales of burning lust; where the remembrance of a passionate encounter is even sweeter and more perfect in its tender recollection. Absence only makes the heart grow hotter.
title: Playgirl: Burning Lust
